course_description: This course enables students to explore tools for analyzing and promoting community formation to mobilize members in partnership with God's work. Students will develop a model of imaginative pastoral leadership-leading a congregation toward deeper awareness of its strengths and assets in order to use its cultural resources more effectively for ministry and mission. Resources for engaging cultural, racial/ethnic, and other particularities will be stressed to enhance the dynamic interplay of diverse peoples within faith communities.
